name: The staff of Denial (1h)
data: It increases hit chance a tiny bit.
It has superb weapon class for its type (weak in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It does cold damage a good amount.
A legend says that this weapon was crafted by Daemon Lord
Aldinachs' court smith. It is said that the staff is made out of
the coldest iron which was hardened in the river Styx. To bind
enchantments into the staff, the smith massacred a village of Dauers
and enslaved peoples' souls into the staff.
